text:
Hello <@U06G4DKLZJP>,

We hope this message finds you well. We wanted to follow up on our previous message. We have yet to receive a response from your end, and we are keen to hear your feedback or any suggestions you might have.

Your input is very important to us, and we would greatly appreciate your timely advice on how to proceed. Please let us know your thoughts at your earliest convenience.

Thank you for your attention to this matter. Looking forward to your reply.

Hi <@U06G4DKLZJP>,

Thank you for your response.

We have a query, do we need to place this script somewhere inside our HubSpot account? As we have used a embedded script provided by HubSpot. An embedded JavaScript code.

How can we achieve this? Please suggest.

Thank you again.
hI Sourav, can you provide us with the [specified code] you are referring, since I just added that as an example instead of using the [specified code] you are mentioning!
Hi <@U06G4DKLZJP>, sure. I will be getting the code shortly from our team & will send to you. Thank you again.
Hi Sourav, sure thing let me know :slightly_smiling_face:
